Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE
REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE

Title: Establishes the sober living task force
Summary: Establishes the sober living task force which shall create best practice guidelines for sober living residences that illustrate the most appropriate and effective environment for persons recovering from a chemical dependency.
LawCode: Add ยง19.04, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing the sober living task force; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
